content.text: According to the Small Business Association (SBA), more than 627,000 new businesses spring up all over the US every year. However, the SBA estimates that only around 51% of small businesses will last past five years. In order for your new business to stay in the game for a long time, you’ll need to have a strong start.

Some advice that successful entrepreneurs offer us is to find a way to get good leads, convert these leads into sales, and ensure repeat sales from customers. It sounds simple, but it requires a lot of work…especially when taking those crucial first steps. And your new business will need reliable tools to accomplish these objectives. This is where high-quality new business signage comes in.

Royal Signs & Awnings is an established local signs provider and we specialize in new business signs. Having been in the industry for many years, our selection of signage options for you is vast so you have the opportunity to choose the most ideal one for your establishment.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation!
Vinyl Promotional Signs for Special Announcements

Your new business is open and people need to know it! Make that awesome announcement with stunning promotional signs by Royal Signs & Awnings. Promotional signs come in so many forms such as vinyl banners, yard signs, flag signs, window stickers, marquis signs, pull-up signs, and even LED message boards, and Royal Signs & Awnings delivers them all.

Vinyl is an excellent choice of material and among the most popular in the sign industry. Because of its reasonable cost, fast-and-easy production, durability, and high versatility, vinyl is one of business owners’ go-to substrates for temporary (and even permanent) signages.

If you’re looking to give your customers a festive and vibrant welcome to your business, flag signs can definitely send that message. They can be printed with the designs that you want and in the shape that you prefer, whether feather, teardrop, or straight. Flag signs are also very eye-catching even from a distance and can help introduce your brand to passing pedestrians and drivers.

If you want to utilize the glass windows on your building, window and glass decals are also very useful. They are affordable, highly customizable, easy to apply, easy to remove, and easy to replace, making them perfect for temporary announcements such as being finally open for business or a grand opening sale.
Durable Outdoor Signage for New Businesses

For signs that serve a more permanent function and are expected to last at least a few years, Royal Signs & Awnings offers durable, long-lasting substrates. Exterior signage like pole signs, building signs, fascia signs, monument signs, backlit sign boxes, channel letters, electronic signs, pylon signs, and more are great for establishing a sense of permanence and stability for your new business.

Here at Royal Signs & Awnings, we have concrete, wood, brick, and even high-pressure laminate for monument signs so that they achieve a rustic and aged look that can last for years. We also produce channel letters that can be made with metal for a touch of sleekness and professionalism, or with hard plastic for a warmer illuminated effect.

You can also make use of today’s technology by choosing among Royal Signs & Awnings’s various electronic and digital signs. They made excellent outdoor signage for new business because they are highly attractive, eye-catching, and customizable to contain the content that you desire. You can show potential customers personalized text, photos, and even videos on your digital screens.

Royal Signs & Awnings has been in the business for many years now and we are the go-to signage provider for new businesses in the area. And the reason behind our success is the fact that we don’t settle with just printing out promotional material and banners for our clients. As a full-service signage provider, we handle practically all facets of the sign-making process and we guide you through every single step.

From free consultation, planning, design, printing, fabrication, installation, and up to maintenance, Royal Signs & Awnings has got you covered. Equipped with the technology, knowledge, and experience, our team of graphic designers, project managers, marketing experts, fabricators, and installers are ready to meet your needs. We’ve worked with numerous local new businesses and we’re excited to do for you the many effective things we’ve done for them.

As a business, we clearly understand what you need when you’re opening up a new business in town…and we’re ready to supply you with your signage needs. Signs by Royal Signs & Awnings are sure to help you bring in customer footfall, convert the footfall to purchases, and to help people identify as well as relate to your business brand.

If you want to know more about new business signage by Royal Signs & Awnings and just how we can help your business start strong, just contact us and we’ll have our experienced signage specialists discuss things with you.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation with a New Business Signs Expert!
